comunicationInput

Class CommunicationWithFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • comunicationInput.CommunicationWithFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComunicationUI

    public final class CommunicationWithFile
extends Object
implements ComunicationUI
    This class is designed to enter information (messages sent from the initialer) through a file. The class is designed as a singleton because there is no need to rebuild the object for this class. The class is defined as final because there is no need to extend this class.

    Author:
    Meysam Aminzadeh on 8/2/2020.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CommunicationWithFile instanceForCommunicationWithFile()
      This method was created to build the Singleton object for this class.
      void makeCommunicationInfoBetween2Player()
      This method generates messages using the input file so that the initialer can send these messages to the next player.
